trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /><see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged" /> and <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged" /> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce i dati per gli eventi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /><see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged" /> e <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> evento viene generato quando il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controllare le modifiche.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged> evento viene generato quando il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> le modifiche alle proprietà.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [NIB: utilizzo degli eventi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to process the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice riportato di seguito viene illustrato come elaborare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided at [How to: Automatically Resize Cells When Content Changes in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice fa parte di un esempio più esaustivo disponibile in [come: automaticamente ridimensionare le celle quando le modifiche di contenuto nel controllo DataGridView Windows Form](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md).

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode" /> property was previously set to any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> value other than <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" /> or the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> property was previously set to any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> value other than <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode" /> in precedenza era stata impostata su un valore <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> diverso da <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" /> e se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> in precedenza era stata impostata su un valore <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> diverso da <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" /> o <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: When implementing a source for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> events, pass in `true` for `previousModeAutoSized` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> already had an automatic resizing mode and the new mode is different.
trans-unit.target: Quando si implementa un'origine per <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventi, passano `true` per `previousModeAutoSized` se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> dispone già di una modalità di ridimensionamento automatico e la nuova modalità è diversa.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value specifying whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> was previously set to automatically resize.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che specifica se in precedenza era stato impostato il ridimensionamento automatico per la classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode" /> property was previously set to any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> value other than <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" /> or the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> property was previously set to any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> value other than <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode" /> in precedenza era stata impostata su un valore <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> diverso da <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" /> e se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> in precedenza era stata impostata su un valore <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> diverso da <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" /> o <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs> class is used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> events, so this property relates specifically to the previous state of either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs> classe viene utilizzata con la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventi, pertanto questa proprietà si riferisce in modo specifico per lo stato precedente di uno il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs.PreviousModeAutoSized%2A> property to check the previous <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> value for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs.PreviousModeAutoSized%2A> proprietà da controllare precedente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> valore per un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided at [How to: Automatically Resize Cells When Content Changes in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice fa parte di un esempio più esaustivo disponibile in [come: automaticamente ridimensionare le celle quando le modifiche di contenuto nel controllo DataGridView Windows Form](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md).
